Potential C stock losses (mass C) and CO 2 emissions (mass CO 2-e year −1) were estimated based on 0.03% annual ecosystem area loss for tidal marshes and mangroves, and 0.1% year −1 for seagrass, and accounted for the sum of C stocks in aboveground biomass and the top meter of soils, assuming that 50% of total C stocks are lost and remineralized to CO 2 after disturbance
